/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/GLFW_OpenGL.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/GLFW_OpenGL.dir/Lesson2_Shaders/main.cpp.o  -o GLFW_OpenGL glfw-3.2.1/src/libglfw3.a -framework OpenGL -framework OpenGL -lGLEW -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation -framework CoreVideo
